summary:
Craftable 'Face Masks' for the characters of Skyrim

There are two versions of the Face Masks that each come in 8 different colours. They can be worn by both males and females and are FULLY compatible with beast races.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1953/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/MFH9yvd.png[/img][/url][line]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5a1Mjaq.jpg[/img]

[size=3]This mod adds a craftable [color=#f4a460][b]'Face Mask'[/b][/color] to the game of Skyrim[/size]


[size=5][b][color=#f4a460].:[/color] Requires Skyrim v1.8+ & Dragonborn DLC [color=#f4a460]:.[/color][/b][/size]

[size=4][b][color=#f4a460].:[/color] FULL Beast race support [color=#f4a460]:.[/color][/b][/size]


It comes in 8 colour variants: Black, Blue, Brown, Green, Purple, Red, White and Yellow.
They use [b][color=#f4a460]New Slots[/color][/b] so they can be worn with any Helmet, Circlet or Robe
[size=1.5](Not suitable with [b]Orc[/b] races, unless you like clipping)[/size]


[b]- Uses Slot [[color=#f4a460]#47[/color]] -[/b]


[youtube]obyaKrWn-aw[/youtube] [youtube]gXxAMESx9A8[/youtube]
Many thanks to [b]Brodual[/b] and [b]insane0hflex[/b] for these awesome mod spotlights[/center][line]

[size=4][color=#f4a460][b]Face Masks for NPCs addon[/b][/color][/size] created by user [color=#f4a460][b]Icefrenzy[/b][/color]
Adds all the face masks from this mod to the NPC level list and the loot list.

[b][u]Which NPCs have the face mask?[/u][/b]
-Bandits
-Civilians (For mods that add NPCs that use the farm clothes list
-Chests/Wardrobes/Crates that have clothes on its loot list
-Merchants that sell clothing


[size=4][color=#f4a460][b]Face Masks with Identity Conceal addon[/b][/color][/size] created by user [color=#f4a460][b]JZBai[/b][/color]
Plugins for both 'Sneak Tools' and 'SkyRe' to allow the Face Masks to conceal the players identity. (Compatible with both item slot versions)


[size=4][color=#f4a460][b]Face Masks of Skyrim - Item Slot 44 addon[/b][/color][/size] created by user [color=#f4a460][b]stileserf[/b][/color]
Sets the Face Masks to use item slot 44 (Default is 47)
[line]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/Brwj4.png[/img]
You can craft the [color=#f4a460][b]'Face Mask'[/b][/color] using any [color=#f4a460][b]'Tanning Rack'[/b][/color] under the [color=#f4a460][b]'Chitin'[/b][/color] section.

To craft a [color=#f4a460][b]'Face Mask'[/b][/color], you will need:
[list][*] 2 Linen Wrap
[/list]
To craft the [color=#f4a460][b]'Face Mask (No Scarf)'[/b][/color] version, you will need:
[list][*] 1 Linen Wrap
[/list]


[img]http://i.imgur.com/iZy5l.png[/img]
[list][*] Download with Nexus Mod Manager and make sure its checked under the Mods tab.
[*] Or download manualy and extract to your Data folder in your Skyrim directory. Then make sure the 'FaceMasksOfSkyrim.esp' file is active in the Data section of your SkyrimLauncher.exe.
[/list]



[img]http://i.imgur.com/JJ6mB.png[/img]
[u][b]v1.1[/b][/u]
- Added new Mask version without the neck scarf
- Added ability to enchant the Face Masks
- Added an optional saturated texture set
- Added new Mask colour (Brown/Leather)
- Changed the item slot to #47 (kept original item slot #55 as optional download)
- Slightly changed the textures brightness levels

[u][b]v1.0[/b][/u]
- Initial release
- Adds craftable [b]'Face Mask'[/b] to the game




[img]http://i.imgur.com/JkeBa.png[/img]

- Added new Mask colour (Brown/Leather)
- Changed the item slot to #47 (kept original item slot #55 as optional download)
- Slightly changed the textures brightness levels
